data.system_settings: iPhone 6s iOS 12.1 Dev Beta - Windows 10 Home x64 1803
data.actual_result: Discord allows you to send the image, even though it never uploads, and retriggers the cooldown on your phone instead of syncing with your computer
data.expected_result: Send button is greyed out because the cooldown is going
data.short_description: Able to send an image while slowmode cooldown is triggered from computer, which causes image to silently fail to send, and retriggers the cooldown on your phone
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure you have your phone and a computer near you - Go into the channel with slowmode on both your phone and computer - Choose an image from your camera roll and have it ready in the inline image drawer - Send a message from your computer to trigger the slowmode cooldown - While the cooldown is counting down, try to send the image from your phone - Observe the cooldown and channel on your phone - You can also choose and send an image after triggering the cooldown on your computer to achieve the same results
